meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family, with heavy scented leaves.
meanings.sent1: The patchoulis in the garden filled the air with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent2: I planted some patchoulis in my backyard to enjoy their fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The patchoulis whispered secrets to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Herbs like patchoulis are the colorful artists of the garden, painting the air with their scents.
meanings.sent5: The patchoulis danced in the breeze, spreading their sweet perfume around.

meanings.definition: A strong-smelling oil made from the leaves of the patchouli plant, used in perfumery.
meanings.sent1: She dabbed a drop of patchoulis behind her ears before going out.
meanings.sent2: The patchoulis essence added a unique touch to the perfume blend.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the bottle of patchoulis, creating a fragrant mess.
meanings.sent4: The patchoulis oil enveloped her in a comforting cocoon of scent.
meanings.sent5: The patchoulis fragrance lingered in the room long after she had left.
